resources.string: 1. Each question in the quiz is of single-choice, multiple-choice or fill-in the blank format.
2. The total score for the quiz is based on your responses to all questions.
3. If you select an incorrect response for a question, you can try again until you get the correct response.
4. After responding to a question, click on the "Submit" button at the bottom of the screen

C - Android supports small,normal, large and extra-large sizes

B - Dialog box is called as ANR.
C - When Android forcefully kills an application, it is called ANR

Q 6 - What is log message in android?
A - Log message is used to debug a program.
Q 7 - What is the difference between content values and cursor in android SQLite?
A - Content values are key pair values, which are updated or inserted in the database
B - Cursor is used to store the temporary result.
C - Cursor is used to store data permanently.
